content: The only people left that are unaware of the 9/11 false flag operation are those that have never spent any time researching it. First, building 7 crumpled into it’s own footprint on the same day as 1 and 2 because of fire. There’s about 40 more of those amazing coincidences that you failed to examine. This failure is what keeps “conspiracy theorists” shunned from society as if no conspiracy has never existed, and if you believe one, then you obviously believe them all. This article is contributing to the failure of the media to report on these topics and the alienation of people who perform their due diligence.
